description: Are you curious about what the current price of the world's leading crypto-currency is? Find out the current price of a bitcoin in US dollars using this app. This app can tell you the value of a bitcoin in US dollars using the most current information available from coindesk.com.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell me the current Bitcoin price
name: Bitcoin Price
shortDescription: This app returns the current price of a Bitcoin in US dollars from coindesk.com.
